item.title: Roozbeh add a quote by Richard Leigh
item.description: "You’ve got to sing like you don’t need the money, Love like you’ll never get hurt. You’ve got to dance like nobody’s watchin’." -- Richard Leigh

item.title: Roozbeh add a quote by Antoine de Saint-Exupéry
item.description: "You become responsible, forever, for what you have tamed." -- Antoine de Saint-Exupéry

item.title: Roozbeh add a quote by Woody Allen
item.description: "I'm not afraid of death; I just don't want to be there when it happens." -- Woody Allen

item.title: Roozbeh add a quote by Andre Gide
item.description: "It is better to be hated for what you are than to be loved for what you are not." -- Andre Gide

item.title: Roozbeh add a quote by Marilyn Monroe
item.description: "I'm selfish, impatient and a little insecure. I make mistakes, I am out of control and at times hard to handle. But if you can't handle me at my worst, then you sure as hell don't deserve me at my best." -- Marilyn Monroe

item.title: Roozbeh add a quote by Albert Camus
item.description: "You will never be happy if you continue to search for what happiness consists of. You will never live if you are looking for the meaning of life." -- Albert Camus

item.title: Roozbeh add a quote by erich fromm
item.description: "Love is not primarily a relationship to a specific person; it is an attitude, an ordination of character which determines the relatedness of the person to the whole world as a whole, not toward one object of love" -- erich fromm

item.title: Roozbeh add a quote by Sigmund Freud
item.description: "Religious doctrines … are all illusions, they do not admit of proof, and no one can be compelled to consider them as true or to believe in them." -- Sigmund Freud

item.title: Roozbeh add a quote by Bob Dylan
item.description: "I think women rule the world and that no man has ever done anything that a woman either hasn't allowed him to do or encouraged him to do." -- Bob Dylan

item.title: Roozbeh add a quote by Karl Popper
item.description: "All life is problem solving" -- Karl Popper

item.title: Roozbeh add a quote by Mark Twain
item.description: "If you tell the truth, you don't have to remember anything." -- Mark Twain
